item.title: A basic notebook with a front matter and front matter divider...
item.description: Hello there! Let $F_1$ be a mapping from $\mathbf{R}^2\to {0,1}$. Then do some italics and some bold boys. Code now? f = lambda x: x**2 + 1 print("f(x) for x from 0 to 4:", *map(f, range(5))) f(x) for x from 0 to 4: 1 2 5 10 17

item.title: My Second Post
item.description: Wats up boys Back for MORE

item.title: A simple perceptron
item.description: Some year around the time when we started using computers, the 50s or so, someone came up with the idea of the perceptron: the brain-inspired machine that could learn! Even though the author had high hopes for this model, it sadly couldn’t learn very much. It is however very easy to implement, so let’s do it. # Start writing code here...
